H0.text: Who was the author of 'The Shortest Way with Dissenters' and `A Journey of the Plague Year'. Jonathan Swift

H1.text: Who was the author of 'The Shortest Way with Dissenters' and `A Journey of the Plague Year'. Henry Fielding

H2.text: Who was the author of 'The Shortest Way with Dissenters' and `A Journey of the Plague Year'. Samuel Johnson

H3.text: Who was the author of 'The Shortest Way with Dissenters' and `A Journey of the Plague Year'. Daniel Foe

A4.text: The Shortest Way with the Dissenters; Or, Proposals for the Establishment of the Church is a pamphlet written by Daniel Defoe, first published anonymously in 1702.

A5.text: A Journal of the Plague Year... is undersigned by the initials 'H. F.', suggesting the author's uncle Henry Foe as its primary source.
